name: Talking Dog (Duke) - My Baby Doggie Pup Animal Friend
name_original: Talking Dog (Duke) - My Baby Doggie Pup Animal Friend
description:
#1 kids app! Featured by iTunes in 26 countries!

"Animations look fluid and sharp", iPhoneAppReview
"Main character is likable", SmartPhoneAppReview

More than 2,000,000 downloads!


If you are looking for some fun then Duke is the dog to know.

Capture his lovable goofball personality by making silly videos to share with friends and family, or for your own amusement— you are a part of his happy happenings!

Interact with him with a variety of tricks and cute habits. There are secret trick buttons too; you can unlock all four buttons once inside the app. Curious to know what Duke is up to? Unlock the four mystery buttons and find out.

Duke has that type of character that makes you wish he could be your dog, because he would sit with you at the table… and TALK to you while having a bowl of cereal!

Now go play!

◆ HOW TO PLAY
See the fun unfold when he:

‣ Dances to Music
‣ Tries to Eat a Slipper
‣ Almost Gets the Bone
‣ Sings Like an Opera Singer
‣ Show Duke Love
‣ Don't Forget to Talk to Duke and He'll Repeat What You Say! Much More...
‣ And…Much Much More


◆ Messaging
4 minute video recording max for newer devices.
Nearly instant compression for video recording on iPhone 4S, iPod 5, & iPad 2 or better.
Now Duke 2 is useful as a messaging tool.
